T02D2756:135a-0: @135a * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2756:135a-2: nam mkha' kun khyab bcu gcig zhal //
T02D2756:135a-3: zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o //
T02D2756:135a-4: zla ba 'brug sgra nam mkha' ltar rmad pa //
T02D2756:135a-5: sku gsung thugs zab stobs bcu'i pha rol phyin //
T02D2756:135a-6: sna tshogs sprul pas dpag med don sgrub pa'i //
T02D2756:135a-7: mgon la btud de bsnyen pa bdag gis bshad//
T02D2756:135a-8: re zhig rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su gnas dang
T02D2756:135a-9: yo byad dang gos dang rgyan nye bar bsags pa
T02D2756:135a-10: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02D2756:135a-11: rang gi sems dro ba rnams kyi bzhi pa me'i
T02D2756:135a-12: bu la brten pa nga ro bzhi pas mnan cing
T02D2756:135a-13: gzhon nu ma'i nu mas brgyan pa can blta bar
T02D2756:135a-14: bya'o // des las 'od phyung rol mo'i sgras //
T02D2756:135a-15: blo gros mi zad bcu gcig zhal //
T02D2756:135a-16: spyan brangs lus btud phyag 'tshal zhing //
T02D2756:135a-17: mchod pa lngas ni yang dag mchod //
T02D2756:135a-18: aom badzra pu shpe a'a: h'um /
T02D2756:135a-19: aom badzra dh'u pe a'a: h'um /
T02D2756:135a-20: aom badzra d'i pe a'a: h'um /
T02D2756:135a-21: aom badzra gandhe a'a: h'um aom badzra nee bi tye a'a: h'um de nas sdig pa bsal la sogs ;
T02D2756:135a-22: / yan lag bzang po spyod kun gyis //
T02D2756:135a-23: dri ma dag par byas nas su //
T02D2756:135a-24: gnas bzhi las ni sems mchog bskyed //
T02D2756:135a-25: chos kun rang bzhin mtshan ma med //
T02D2756:135a-26: gdod nas ma skyes mi 'gro ba //
T02D2756:135a-27: bde chen 'od gsal rnam mi rtog / mkhas pas khong na mngon du bya //
T02D2756:135b-0: aom sva bh'a ba @135b shaddha: sarbadha rm'a: sva bh'a ba bi shuddho nya\ ham /
T02D2756:135b-1: gang zhig kun rtog mtshan nyid med //
T02D2756:135b-2: de ni bdag sems 'od gsal nyid //
T02D2756:135b-4: da ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin //
T02D2756:135b-5: aom sva tsitta sh'u n+ya t'a badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma konya\ham /
T02D2756:135b-6: stong pa nyid sems sgyu ma'i tshul /
T02D2756:135b-7: sprul pa'i mdzad pa kun sgrub phyir //
T02D2756:135b-8: skye ba med las skye ba'i dngos //
T02D2756:135b-10: thugs rje'i snying po las byung ba //
T02D2756:135b-11: spro dang bsdu dang sdig sel ba'i //
T02D2756:135b-12: mtshan ma rgyal ba sdug bsngal gcod //
T02D2756:135b-13: bcu gcig zhal mnga' rnam par bsgom //
T02D2756:135b-14: phyag gnyis thugs kar thal sbyar zhing //
T02D2756:135b-15: bgrang phreng padmo g-yas g-yon gnyis //
T02D2756:135b-16: ril pa mchog spyin 'khor lo dang /
T02D2756:135b-17: rdo rje mda' gzhu 'dzin par brtag / ti se'i gangs dang ston zla sos ka'i nyi 'od can //
T02D2756:135b-18: mu tig gser sogs ji snyed rgyan mang kun mnga' ba //
T02D2756:135b-19: zhal ni bcu gcig nor bu me mdog ske rags can //
T02D2756:135b-20: ri dags lpags 'dzin 'dzum zhal gzi brjid 'bar ba'o //
T02D2756:135b-21: de nas snying po'i sa bon gyis spyan drangs nas
T02D2756:135b-22: sku gsung thugs legs par gnas pas dbang bskur ba'i
T02D2756:135b-24: skyo bar gyur na sngags bzlas pas 'khor lo dgye ba'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya ste /
T02D2756:135b-30: pra tsa le pra tsa le /
T02D2756:135b-31: ku su me ku su ma ba re /
T02D2756:135b-33: tsi te dzva la ma pa na ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2756:135b-35: gal te blo zhan rtul mi pho //
T02D2756:135b-36: zhal lnga phyag brgyad zhal gsum dang //
T02D2756:135b-37: phyag drug de bzhin zhal gcig dang //
T02D2756:135b-38: phyag gnyis pa yang bsgom par bya //
